ygData.subject: Re: Charges of items
ygData.msgSnippet: Where can the Glimmer ring be recharged at? Belgarth ... _____________________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Free instant messaging
ygData.messageBody:
Where can the Glimmer ring be recharged at?

Belgarth

--- Jason Shy <demur@...> wrote:
> From: "Jason Shy" <demur@...>
>
> Depends on the item. Examples. . .
> -Wooly spider silk -- (i think) has 2 charges of
> ensnaring roots. No way to
> recharge.
> -Squad ring (heal). . rechargeable unlimited times
> (granted you dont mind
> the walk)
> -Glimmer ring (gate). . can be recharged for a fee
>
> Im sure that there are lots of items that can be
> recharged that no one knows
> about yet. . like the observer staff. . .Im sure
> that somewhere there is a
> way to recharge it. Maybe not. . .more will unfold
> as people do more quests
> and such.
>
> Okay now Im rambling. . .hope this helps.
>
> Demur
